thread.title: Pretoria school calls in lawyers over dad's car banner protest
thread.title_full: Pretoria school calls in lawyers over dad's car banner protest | News24

author: news24.com
title: Pretoria school calls in lawyers over dad's car banner protest
text:
Pretoria - The HoÃ«rskool Oos Moot in Pretoria is seeking legal advice after banners calling for the principal to be sacked were attached to two vehicles parked outside the school gate.
"It is with our lawyers, we cannot comment at this stage," a staff member told News24 on Friday.
The Pretoria Rekord Moot reported that disgruntled parent Roelf van der Merwe's first protest was outside the school on October 2.
The banners are printed in big red letters and read: "OOS MOOT Fire the principal that did nothing to stop bullying."
